text: "Don't Tell Me What to Do" is a song by Australian rock band Baby Animals. It was released in June 1993 as the first single from their second studio album Shaved and Dangerous (1993). The song peaked at number 24 on the ARIA Singles Chart. ==Track listings== CD single (72787250402) # "Don't Tell Me What to Do" – 4:11 # "Harmony Children" – 3:32 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! Chart (1993) ! Peak position |- |} ==External links== * ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:1993 singles Category:Baby Animals songs
title: Don't Tell Me What to Do (Baby Animals song)
